pullRequest.title: Break out unit and integration tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
Issue #, if available:
Description of changes:
Separates out the running of unit and integration tests. mvn test will only run the unit tests. Use mvn verify to run both, or use mvn surefire:test@integration-tests to run only the integration tests.
By submitting this pull request, I confirm that you can use, modify, copy, and redistribute this contribution, under the terms of your choice.

commit.message: Tag tests as integration, separate out test runs for unit and integration
